oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with Walker Whiteside, 1980 September 03, excerpt 01
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Walker Whiteside, conducted on 3 September 1980 by Leanne Thornton as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. 1910-1935 Oral History Project. Whiteside discusses popular places to take a date in Nashville during the early 1900s, including the Orpheum and Vendome theatres. The complete interview, as well as an index, is available in the repository.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Whiteside, Walker--Interviews
Orpheum Theatre (Nashville, Tenn.); Vendome Theatre (Nashville, Tenn.)
